headline: PepsiCo (PEP) Stock Moves -1.01%: What You Should Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, PepsiCo (PEP) stood at $144.12, denoting a -1.01% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid PEP and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, PepsiCo’s shares (currently trading at $144.53) have posted a disappointing 16.5% loss while the S&P 500 was down 7.7%. This might have investors contemplating their next move.

headline: PepsiCo (NasdaqGS:PEP) Faces Shareholder Proposal Over Plastic Pollution Report
summary: PepsiCo (NasdaqGS:PEP) recently faced increased investor attention due to an activist proposal urging the company to address its use of flexible plastic packaging. This, along with the company's ongoing discussions about acquiring the soda brand Poppi, could have influenced its stock movements. Despite a strong earnings report and increased dividends, PepsiCo's stock was flat over the last quarter, diverging from broader market trends. Meanwhile, major indexes saw significant gains following...
